D, G = map(int, input().split())
p = [0] * D
c = [0] * D
for i in range(D):
    p[i], c[i] = map(int, input().split())

ans = float('inf')
for i in range(2 ** D):
    score = 0
    num = 0
    rest_max = -1
    for j in range(D):
        if (i >> j) & 1:
            score += (j + 1) * 100 * p[j] + c[j]
            num += p[j]
        else:
            rest_max = j
    if score < G:
        score += (rest_max + 1) * 100 * (p[rest_max] - 1) + c[rest_max]
        num += p[rest_max] - 1
        if score < G:
            score += (rest_max + 1) * 100
            num += 1
    ans = min(ans, num)
print(ans)

D, G = map(int, input().split())
p_c = [list(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(D)]

ans = float('inf')
for i in range(1 << D):
    score = 0
    num = 0
    rest_max = -1
    for j in range(D):
        if (i >> j) & 1:
            num += p_c[j][0]
            score += p_c[j][0] * (j + 1) * 100 + p_c[j][1]
        else:
            rest_max = j
    if score < G:
        num += -(- (G - score) // ((rest_max + 1) * 100))
    ans = min(ans, num)

print(ans)

# print(ans)

D, G = map(int, input().split())
p_c = [tuple(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(D)]

ans = 10**9
for i in range(2**D):
    score = 0
    cnt = 0
    for j in range(D):
        if (i >> j) & 1:
            score += p_c[j][0] * (j+1) * 100 + p_c[j][1]
            cnt += p_c[j][0]
    for j in range(D-1, -1, -1):
        if (i >> j) & 1 == 0:
            if p_c[j][0] * (j+1) * 100 + score < G:
                cnt += p_c[j][0]
            else:
                cnt += (G - score) // ((j+1) * 100)
                if (G - score) % ((j+1) * 100) != 0:
                    cnt += 1
            break
    ans = min(ans, cnt)
print(ans)
